Key Match Events: West Indies are out of the 2024 ICC T20 World Cup
Roston Chase starred with bat and ball for West Indies
South Africa won the match with 5 balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram described the West Indies total of 135 as ‘subpar'
Rovman Powell urged West Indies cricket fans to view their team’s performance through wide lenses
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was interrupted by showers in Antigua
The target was changed to 123 from 17 overs due to the rain
Others: West Indies allrounder Roston Chase scored 52 runs
South Africa allrounder Marco Jansen hit an unbeaten 21 off 14 balls to see off West Indies
